lines.text: All that hay burned to ash, right? But...
There's no ash leading to where Slick Emmup is lying. What's up with that?
Like, if he was caught in the fire, and then stumbled over here... wouldn't that mean he'd spread-
Your footprints, y-yes. Your robe swept it away when you walked over it.
You check the hem of your robe for ash.
...Um. Well, that- that could've just been from when I was checking the ash pile, right?
Leo, do you remember if there was ash there before I showed up?
There was. Th-that's all there is to say.
...Well, crap. We can't figure it out either way.
